backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing categories, products, orders, and user profiles with access control, public browsing, and restricted user/admin actions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all frontend files used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark OKLCH color variables and global layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up all public and admin routes with TanStack Router and wraps the app in theme and toast providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Component that checks Internet Identity login and admin role, blocking access to admin pages if unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Dialog form for creating or editing a product, handling fields, photo upload, and submit via updateProduct mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductPho: Handles image selection, validation, preview, upload progress, and emits an ExternalBlob for product photos.
frontend/src/components/auth/CustomerLog: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading state and automatic session clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to submit name and email, saving via profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AdminLayo: Admin-only page layout with navigation, logout handling, and route guarding.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Public site layout with header, navigation, cart button, login button, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/products/AZFilte: Alphabet filter component allowing users to pick or clear a starting-letter filter.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays a product with image, details, price, category, and add-to-cart button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthGate.ts: Provides a helper to require authentication for actions, triggering login and executing the intended action afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context with login, logout, stored identity restoration, and status tracking via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines data-fetching and mutation hooks for products, categories, orders, and user profiles using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for light and dark medical-themed UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: A static About page describing the company, mission, vision, and values.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Displays all categories, allows adding new ones via a dialog, and shows loading or empty states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Shows admin stats for products, categories, and pending orders with navigation links.
Handles admin login using Internet Identity and redirects authenticated admins to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Displays details for a single order and lets admins update its status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Lists all orders with status badges and links to detailed views, showing loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Shows product list with edit and delete actions and opens dialogs for adding or editing products.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart with item management, totals, and checkout navigation based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow, requiring authentication and profile completion before submitting orders and clearing the cart.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays company contact info and a simple contact form with simulated submission.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the landing page with hero content, features, and calls to action for browsing products or contacting.
frontend/src/pages/OrderHistoryPage.tsx: Shows authenticated users their past orders, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays detailed product info and allows users to add the item to their cart with auth gating.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Lists all products with Aâ€“Z filtering and handles adding items to the cart after auth and profile checks.
frontend/src/state/cartStore.ts: Defines a persisted Zustand store for cart items with add, remove, update, and total-count helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from session or the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and enabling typography, container-query, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: JSON file storing project metadata, feature definitions, requirements, and architectural notes for the application.
